## NEU Khoury College CS 7290: Summer 2019

These are lecture notes for an ongoing [course](https://github.com/robertness/causalML) on causal inference and modeling in machine learning, taught by Dr. Robert O. Ness.  These notes are a work in progress, created as the course progresses.  They are created by the instructor, the course TA's [Kaushal Paneri](https://www.linkedin.com/in/kaushalpaneri/) and Sicheng Hao, and the Summer 2019 students of this course.
